s1.name: Mailing Lists
s1.p:
For sending questions to the JORAM users and developers community, please post mails to the joram@objectweb.org forum. For browsing its archives or subscribing to it, check ObjectWeb's
mailing lists service.
Questions and feedbacks related to using JORAM within a JOnAS server should be sent to the JOnAS mailing list.
For getting in touch with the JORAM development team only (the team also receives and reads the community mails), post mails to joram-team@objectweb.org.

p.em: Please keep trying to send mails to the JORAM community list. Your experience and questions are likely to be of interest to many users. Also, you increase your chance of getting adequate answers and feedback.
